tips: Hint: Faction gain Attack Bonus to other Factions: Ghost→Human→Monster→Fairy→Ghost, Demon→Angel, Angel→Demon.
Hint: There are 5 different grades of Girls ranging from lowest to highest quality: 1-star, 2-star, 3-star, 4-star and 5-star.
Hint: Spend Lunch Boxes to upgrade your Girl's Grade and unlock new skills.
Hint: There are 6 equipment qualities, from low to high: Blue, Gold, Purple, Green, Red and Orange.
Hint: Fighting with 6 Girls that are in the same faction activates an aura that increases their stats.
Hint: You get 1 free chance to use Regular Capsule every 8 hours and 1 free chance to use Advanced Capsule every 48 hours.
Hint: Girls who fight in the front-line tends to take more damage so placing Girls with excellent Defense is recommended.
Hint: The order in which your Girls attack is determined by their Speed stats with Girl with the highest speed going first.
Hint: Players with higher VIP Level are granted more privileges in game.
